answers.answer: Aww, try and relax. I hope you're okay, and feel better soon!
Praying for you girl!
What's going on? Did they tell you why it's so high?
Thanks. I'm just worried because I had an xray done of my chest, and although they put a shield over my stomach, I'm starting to regret it.
but the baby is ok?
Nope, not yet. it was 198/84. And I'm kinda mad because they have me waiting in the hallway on a stretcher.
aww did they check ur lil man to see how he is doin?
Hope everything is ok. Keep us updated. Try to stay calm.
I'm going to see if they'll do an ultrasound of him because I've been worried sick since they did the xray.
im sure hes fine hun;0 positive thoughts!!
Keep us posted sweet mama
Do yall think they'll do an ultrasound if I ask? I don't want them to think that I came just to check on bubs but I'm seriously worried now about that xray affecting him.
Hopsitals wont unless they feel that there is a need to usually
Maybe they'll at least check his hb then? :(
Im sure they probably will. Good luck hope everything is okay

As long as they put that cover over your stomach, he's fine. I had pneumonia when preg with the 2 yr old and had to go through xrays. They'll at least check his hb though. L&D came down to me every morning and night to check the hb while I was in the hospital.
Thank goodness. Now I'm less stressed lol
Get well soon dear !!!

They're saying that it may be the early stages of preeclampsia. The Dr is going to go over my chest xray one more time and then send me up to l&d to get the baby checked and then they may decide to keep me if my BP doesn't go down.

I had an x ray at the er when I was 18 weeks, don't worry about that! It won't hurt him one bit, I worried too but there is no need to worry about the x ray! Good luck with the rest of the tests, and they should be hooking you up to tge monitors once you get to L&D and if not then they will at least do fetal heart tones. They are usually required as they have 2 patients.
So do they think you have preeclampsia
any updates
Hope everythings ok and they can get ur blood pressure under control. Praying for u x

question: I've been in the hospital for chest pains and a migraine and my left arm is hurting. I went into the ER earlier today, and they admitted me as soon as I walked in the door because of my blood pressure and I've finally been allowed access to my phone, so I'm not going completely crazy, although I am quite emotional.
title: I'm back!...sorta :/
